title: Gilded full helm

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Gilded full helm is a gold-plated version of the rune full helm and a part of gilded equipment. It has the same stats as the rune full helmet, and only differs in appearance. It requires 40 Defence to wear.

Item ID3486

The Gilded full helm is a gold-plated version of the rune full helm and a part of gilded equipment. It has the same stats as the rune full helmet, and only differs in appearance. It requires 40 Defence to wear.

It can be obtained as a reward from hard, elite and master tier Treasure Trails and cannot be made through any skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+30+32+27-1+30
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The helmet's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -2 to -3.

19 May 2016
(update)

The item was made available to free-to-play players.

[[File:Gilded full helm detail.png|left|110px]]
[[File:Gilded full helm chathead.png|left]]
The '''Gilded full helm''' is a gold-plated version of the [[rune full helm]] and a part of [[gilded equipment]]. It has the same stats as the rune full helmet, and only differs in appearance. It requires 40 [[Defence]] to wear.

It can be obtained as a reward from [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]], [[Clue scroll (elite)|elite]] and [[Clue scroll (master)|master]] tier [[Treasure Trails]] and '''cannot''' be made through any skill.
